guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Belzutifan - CYP2C19 and/or UGT2B17

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 19

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166309881
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: CYP2C19 and/or UGT2B17 poor metabolizers

text.html: "Results in higher systemic concentrations and may result in higher adverse reaction risk (anemia, hypoxia). Monitor patients who are poor metabolizers for both genes for adverse reactions."
